item.description:
Join us for a remembrance service for ANZAC day at the Emmanuel Church on Newbury Street, followed by a casual reception where such goodies as anzac bikkies and mini meat pies might also make an appearance!

Then move on to a nearby pub for anyone who cares to go for a drink.

Hope to see you there - I have contacted the organiser for this event and confirmed that it is a 'the more the merrier' occasion. If anyone has any culinary skills and feels like volunteering, the organiser would be more than happy to hear from you.... I shall be baking a plate of lamingtons, coz my lamingtons rock.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: ANZAC day service and drinks
